IncidentCommentDTO Data Type

This data type has been deprecated.

This object represents an incident comment. This class is being deprecated in v27.2 and will be removed in v29. Applications using this class should switch to using the CommentDTO class instead.

Properties
name data type description
Properties inherited from CommentDTO
number The comment's ID.
number The ID of the parent comment (null for top-level comments).
ObjectHandle The ID of the user who created the comment. See the fullOrgDTO (users property) for a list of possible user values.
string The user's first name.
string The user's last name.
number The date the comment was created.
number The date the comment was modified.
ModifyUserDTO
TextContentDTO The comment text.
array of CommentDTO An array of children comment objects (these are "replies" to this comment).
array of object An array of user IDs who are mentioned in this comment. You mention a user in a comment by typing @User. Note that the client populates this. That is, the client will have to populate mentioned_users itself (the server does not currently parse the comment text to look for mentioned users).
CommentPermsDTO An object that describes the current user's permissions on the comment object.
boolean A flag indicating if the comment is deleted. Generally comment objects are actually removed from the database when the user deletes them. However, if the user deletes a parent comment the parent is just marked as deleted (and it's text is cleared).
array of ActionInfoDTO The list of actions available to the caller for execution.
number The ID of the incident to which this comment belongs.
string The name of the incident to which this comment belongs.
number The ID of the task to which this comment belongs. Will be null on incident comments.
string The name of the task to which this comment belongs. Will be null on task comments.
CommentType The type of the comment (incident or task).
ObjectHandle The owner of the incident to which this comment belongs.

Example

{
  "id" : 12345,
  "parent_id" : 12345,
  "user_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "user_fname" : "...",
  "user_lname" : "...",
  "create_date" : 12345,
  "modify_date" : 12345,
  "modify_user" : {
    "id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "first_name" : "...",
    "last_name" : "..."
  },
  "text" : {
    "format" : "unknown",
    "content" : "..."
  },
  "children" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "parent_id" : 12345,
    "user_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "user_fname" : "...",
    "user_lname" : "...",
    "create_date" : 12345,
    "modify_date" : 12345,
    "modify_user" : {
      "id" : { },
      "first_name" : "...",
      "last_name" : "..."
    },
    "text" : {
      "format" : "html",
      "content" : "..."
    },
    "children" : [ { }, { } ],
    "mentioned_users" : [ { }, { } ],
    "comment_perms" : {
      "update" : true,
      "delete" : true
    },
    "is_deleted" : true,
    "actions" : [ {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    }, {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    } ],
    "inc_id" : 12345,
    "inc_name" : "...",
    "task_id" : 12345,
    "task_name" : "...",
    "type" : "incident",
    "inc_owner" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "parent_id" : 12345,
    "user_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "user_fname" : "...",
    "user_lname" : "...",
    "create_date" : 12345,
    "modify_date" : 12345,
    "modify_user" : {
      "id" : { },
      "first_name" : "...",
      "last_name" : "..."
    },
    "text" : {
      "format" : "text",
      "content" : "..."
    },
    "children" : [ { }, { } ],
    "mentioned_users" : [ { }, { } ],
    "comment_perms" : {
      "update" : true,
      "delete" : true
    },
    "is_deleted" : true,
    "actions" : [ {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    }, {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    } ],
    "inc_id" : 12345,
    "inc_name" : "...",
    "task_id" : 12345,
    "task_name" : "...",
    "type" : "task",
    "inc_owner" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }
  } ],
  "mentioned_users" : [ { }, { } ],
  "comment_perms" : {
    "update" : true,
    "delete" : true
  },
